title: Ticket #4427: fungible custom resources using INVENTORY scripts are always 0
description: The parser for Detected<TAG> for custom resources that are defined using a MACHINE_RESOURCE_INVENTORY_SCRIPT currently only works then the value of Detected<TAG> is a string. This is correct for non-fungible resources, but incorrect for fungible resources (i.e. when the value is an integer or double)
remarks:
2014-Jun-30 12:09:23 by johnkn:
There is a workaround for now, where the script can return 

    DetectedTag="1"

instead of 

    DetectedTag=1

this will get parsed correctly.

2014-Aug-04 15:09:02 by gthain:
CODE REVIEW All good.
